svg.text: Democratizing Cloud Security Through AI-Powered Intelligence
Series A Investment Opportunity • $68.6B Market • First-Mover Advantage

g.text: • Complex AWS security policies incomprehensible to non-security teams
• Development teams dependent on security experts for basic questions
• Manual remediation processes slow and error-prone
• Security becomes bottleneck instead of enabler for cloud innovation
• $8.4M average cost of data breaches due to delayed responses
"Transform every team member into a security-aware stakeholder"
• 95% willing to pay for democratization solution
🛡️ Defensible moat through AI training data and customer relationships
Join us in democratizing security for 100,000+ enterprises • Contact: investors@secureai.com
